title: Crashes in Champ Select
body: I think i have lost a bout 50 LP From crashing in champ select even thought nothing happened. I've repaired my league of legends multiple times and it doesn't solve the problem. I've asked about 50 friends on mine about this and they also said they crashed many times. How is this fair? We are losing LP because the league client is glitchy and keeps crashing. Sometimes i crash just entering the league client itself and not just champ select.

replies.body:
Based on your thread, I went ahead and looked at our data for North America as a whole to see if there is a large number of players having issues with crashing in Champ Select.  Unfortunately, there hasn't been any widespread reports or higher than normal crashes.  Because of this, I want to try eliminating as many of the most common root causes before looking at this a bit further (such as an issue on our end).  

Make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  There are a ton of steps there, but completing every single one will allow us to rule out the most common things and focus on other solutions.

Let me know if you are still experiencing issues!
Wait,what is that bs,losing lp as a loss instead of dodging? what???
